FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: “Removing the encumbrance of useless brain tissue grants several advantages: a slight increase in mobility, a response of revulsion and horror from the enemy, and, in the case of large specimens, room for passengers.” —Zul Ashur, lich lord
